Text:
[V]This is the day, the Lord has made
[R]This is the day, [*] the Lord has made
[V]Let us rejoice and be glad in it.
[V] Glory to the Father, to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit.
Changes: 2021-04-10 - Paul Prins: Initial translation from Latin
2022-04-15 - Paul Prins: Update structure to match responses
